Philippine President Ferdinand Marcus
GR announced to remove the ceiling price for
both regular rice and

this is the right time to lift the
ceiling on rice prices. Because the Government has
enough necessary supply, the
government will continue to support farmers and
poor people combined with promoting  including the

increased to an alarming level due to the influence of
domestic and foreign events. Rice is the
main food in the Philippines

can be very small in size and move
faster than a bullet, thus potentially
endangering satellites and
spacecraft.  The UK has developed
a device that can detect and
track these Phoenix pieces to limit incidents of
collisions with decommissioned satellites or
unused parts of spacecraft and
rockets.  floating in space,
they can collide many times and
form clouds of
extremely small debris. According to Odin Space company, they
have developed a sensor plate that
can detect pieces of space junk as small
as 0.  1 mm and moving at
thousands of meters per millisecond, these plates
will be mounted on the outside, space junk satellites
will pass through the plates and create
sound vibrations sensors at the corners will
listen  From those vibrations, we will know what
size the piece of debris is
moving at what speed and in
which direction. From the data of the Odin device, we
can create a map of the pieces of
space debris, thereby assisting us.
Satellite launch plans as well as the
decommissioning of existing satellites in

on an Italian satellite in

FIFA announced that Portugal, Spain and
Morocco will co-host the 2030 World Cup.
However, the first three matches of the
tournament will be held in South America. The 2030 World Cup
will therefore become  The first World Cup
will be held in six countries on
three different continents.
Fifa said that the Federation's council has
unanimously signed to accept the sole hosting application
of Portugal, Spain and Mar, in addition to
2030.  Nearly 100 years since the
first World Cup was held in Uruguay, the
first three matches of the 2030 World Cup
will take place in South America, first in Uruguay,
Argentina and Paraguay. The first match of
the tournament will be held at the same stadium.
Estadio Sario in Monev is also the stadium that
hosted the 1930 World Cup final,
host Uruguay defeated Artin to
win the championship. All six teams
above will automatically compete in the
final round, including 48 mar teams.  and Vietnam will
host the World Cup for the first time while
Vietnam was the host in 1982. FIFA
also said that the 2034 World Cup will be
held in Asia or Oceania,
calling for members from these two regions to join together.
